      • responseCode

      • errorStream

        public final Optional<ConvertibleAsset<InputStream>> errorStream
        A convertible InputStream that represents the underlying errorStream. This is Optional and won't be populated if there is no error stream

      • responseStream

        public final Optional<ConvertibleAsset<InputStream>> responseStream
        A convertible InputStream that represents the underlying inputStream. This is Optional and won't be populated if there is no error stream

      • responseHeaders

        public final Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders
        This is a map of the response headers

      • inputStreamToUTF8StringConverter

        public static java.util.function.Function<InputStream,String> inputStreamToUTF8StringConverter(java.util.function.Consumer<Exception> onError)
        Static method that will give a converter to decode an UTF-8 input stream into a java string
        Parameters:
        onError - called if there is an error decoding the string
        Returns:
        the converted string, or an empty string if there is an error.
